content: this is my simple all in one baby fish fry pattern it is designed to be worked in one piece without having to join on any other parts i do have a larger fish pattern already but i had a request for a smaller and quicker fish project this pattern is about half the size of the other fish i can complete one in under 20 mins the size is roughly 8 cm long including the tail and 4 cm high any size yarn and hook can be used great project to use up your scrap balls of yarn too please see my other all in one patterns
